extendedInfo.description: Audio collection of talks on the teachings of the Catholic Church on subjects such as the Commandments, Heaven, Hell, Purgatory, Mary, Chastity, the Eucharist, Marriage, and more. All speakers and talk content are 100% faithful to the teachings of the Catholic Church. Download the app for free and sample some of the talks. Upgrade to the full version to have unlimited access to the complete library of talks.These MP3's are streamed to your Android device, not downloaded, so they take up no storage space.  A connection is required for the MP3 to play properly.If you have already purchased the full library on another Android device, you can unlock it again by downloading the free version, selecting the "Upgrade" button, and going through the purchase process again. You will not be charged again. HAVING PROBLEMS?** Try uninstalling and reinstall the free app, then upgrade again. Any time you reinstall an app you purchased,you have to go through the upgrade process again.  You will not actually be charged again **** New device? Same as the above directions for reinstalling. **** Google Plays won't let you reinstall saying "you already own it"?  This is a bug they are working on but have not fixed yet.  We have a work around in the meantime.  Please email us at catholicvault@gmail.com to request instructions. **Associated Themes for Catholics:  Prayer, Philosophy, Theology, Christian Apologetics, Evangelization.

reviews.title: Proceed with caution
reviews.comment: All the content in the apps from this developer are 5 star but in May I couldn\'t get an upgrade to work after emails back and forth they refunded my purchase. Now after the ICS update on my Razr I emailed 10 & 20 days ago about an app and nobody responded. The content is very good but if you upgrade and need help support seems to be gone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I am thirsting for the truth. This is a great app. I\'m thankful for finding it.
reviews.author: Terri Flament

reviews.title: Two thumbs up
reviews.comment: Much to learn from these superb recordings.
reviews.author: Bruce Mills

reviews.title: Be a Catholic who knows your Faith
reviews.comment: If you want to know your Faith or just gain deep insight into it...Get this app and watch how much more you will know, love, and understand the Church!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nik
reviews.comment: I love this app. I have a very strong faith and this app has given me the tools to strengthen my faith even further.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It is a blessing this app and the rest!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Low quality audio
reviews.comment: I am surprised that the audio quality is so low.   Why not offer the option for high quality audio?   Uninstalling until improved audio quality.
reviews.author: Terry Dillon

reviews.title: Cannot upgrade
reviews.comment: Like you David I have had the same experience. It\'s awful. Awful management of the app & awful ownership. I was refunded & told to try to reinstall again. And I\'m waiting for that second refund ANTHONY. I\'m done with this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: It is a bait and switch where they want you to buy the program
reviews.author: Debbie Smith
